name: Classic Lines From Classic Movies Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Of all the gin joints in ... all the world ...'
'I am more interested in the Rock of Ages than in the age of rocks.'
questions.explanation:
Fredric March.

	'Inherit the Wind'. To Spencer Tracy.

Edward G. Robinson

	'Little Caesar'. Spoken to himself.

Marlon Brando.

	'On the Waterfront'. To Rod Steiger.

questions.text: 'Fasten your seat belts. It's gonna be a bumpy night.'
questions.explanation:
Bette Davis.

	'All About Eve'. To everyone in the room.

questions.text:
Question to the person mentioned below:
"Is this another one of your half-baked ideas?' 
Answer from the person mentioned below: 
"No, it's been fully baked."
questions.explanation:
Dustin Hoffman.

	'The Graduate'. Benjamin answering a question from his parents.

questions.text: 'You know how to whistle, don't you?'
questions.explanation:
Lauren Bacall.

	To Humphrey Bogart in "To Have and Have Not".

questions.text: 'You sent us to guard the wrong man.'
'I don't get tough. My lawyers do.'
'What is it?' 'The stuff that dreams are made of.'
questions.explanation:
Humphrey Bogart.

	'The Maltese Falcon'. The question came from Ward Bond.
